{{ #widget : HeatMap
  | input = 'regionname'
  | output = {{ 'sumGrant' }}

      ?role <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/region> ?region . 
      ?region <http://ammap.com/region/name> ?regionname .
      }
    GROUP BY ?regionname'
  | map = 'united_kingdom_regions'
}}

== Project funding timeline ==
{{ #widget : StockChart
  | input = 'start'
  | output = {{ 'sumGrant' }}
  | query = 'SELECT (SUM(<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer>(?grant)) AS ?sumGrant) ?start WHERE {
      ?role <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/grant> ?grant . 
      ?role <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/project> ?project . 
      ?project <http://purl.org/stuff/project/startDate> ?start . 
      ?role <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/region> ?region . }
    GROUP BY ?start'
  | settings = 'Settings:stock.countdaily'
}}



<br/>

== Ratio of live and closed projects ==

{{ #widget : PieChart
  | input = 'status'
  | output = {{ 'countProject' }}
  | query = 'SELECT (COUNT(?project) AS ?countProject) ?status WHERE {
      ?project research:projectStatus ?status . }
    GROUP BY ?status'
  | title = 'Research'
}}
